description: Try our easy to follow Egg & Tomato Share Pan recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Egg & Tomato Share Pan Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 green and 2 red capsicums, deseeded, sliced
0.25 cup olive oil, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, wide frying pan over medium heat. Add capsicum, onion, garlic, spices and oregano and cook for 12 minutes, stirring often, or until softened. Add vinegar and cook until reduced by half.

Add tomatoes, harissa and 1/3 cup water, stirring to combine. Cook for 10-12 minutes, stirring regularly, to allow flavours to develop and sauce to thicken. Reduce heat to low. Using a spoon, make a hole in the sauce and crack an egg into it. Repeat with remaining eggs. Using a fork, drag egg whites to allow them to mix slightly with the sauce. Simmer for 10-12 minutes or until eggs are cooked to your liking. Scatter over parsley and drizzle with extra oil. Serve with toast.
